name: Settings ➜ Advanced ➜ Send messages on… (MacOS steps, Win steps)
precondition: Run these tests on https://mysql.test.mattermost.com/

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P4 - Low-Impact (Edge or unsuitable to repeat?)
customFields.Update notes: 28 Jan 21, Linda: Appears to have been marked N/A for Cypress and Rainforest because of different test steps for MacOS vs. Win. P4, so not a priority to get automated anyway.

inline.description:
On a Mac:
  1. Navigate to Settings ➜ Advanced ➜ Send messages on…
inline.expectedResult:
• The text is Mac specific:
    • "Send messages on ⌘+ENTER"
    • "When enabled, ⌘ + ENTER will send the message and ENTER inserts a new line."

customFields.Related ticket(s): "Send message on Ctrl+Enter" should say "Cmd+Enter" on a Mac — MM-18609
customFields.Important notes about this step: Note: If you are testing on Windows please mark this step as Passed

inline.description:
On Windows:
  1. Navigate to Settings ➜ Advanced ➜ Send messages on…
inline.expectedResult:
• The text is Windows specific:
    • "Send messages on CTRL+ENTER"
    • "When enabled, CTRL + ENTER will send the message and ENTER inserts a new line."

customFields.Important notes about this step: Note: If you are testing on Mac please mark this step as Passed
